creator: Oversea-Chinese Banking Corporation Limited
descriptionHtml:
HR In Your Pocket (HIP) is a mobile app designed to provide access to HR-related information and services.

HIP facilitates candidates and job seekers in their job search and view the career opportunities at OCBC Bank.

For employees, HIP allows you to apply for leave on the go, submit and track the status of your medical and lifestyle expense reimbursement claims, browse internal job postings for new career opportunities, and much more! You can also ask the app's in-built chatbot HR-related questions and get an instant response.

Developed in-house based on your needs, HIP allows employees to interact with HR anytime and anywhere in a convenient and user-friendly manner.
descriptionShort: HIP is designed to provide access to HR-related information and services.
